name: D4taSnoop
description:
D4taSnoop

by Circumpunk - KKB

Theme: Data

Background:
You are out of Data! Snoop next to houses to start your downloads. But don't get seen or the WiFi will be locked out, and you'll trigger an alarm.

Controls:
WASD - Move
Left Click - Dash
R - Restart

Hello everyone and thanks for checking out my game. I am new to the itch.io community and this is my first game jam I have ever entered anywhere. Wow...now that I think of it, its actually one of my first Unity Engine games I have shared with anyone in fact.

It has been a fun and enlightening experience. I planned things quite sporadically (not recommended hehe) so I think I did go over the 3 hour time limit. I will admit it was probably closer to 4 and half to 5.
I have definitely picked up some tips and techniques for next time to be able to work more efficiently.

I had to spend some time tweaking the difficulty, as my first build was probably too difficult. There were only 3 alarms allowed and the houses WiFi would be turned off randomly forcing you to have to venture alot
more through the minefield of watchers. Who knows I could maybe put that version up somewhere too. I had other plans for variation and challenge but there just wasn't time (boohoo).
I am hoping it is the right amount of challenging, but I think there is a secret to it that will help you win alot once you know it.

Anyhow enough of my ramble, I hope you enjoy it and I look forward to hopefully being able to share more with you all sometime. And also to see some of the other great submissions for the many jams and stuff from the community.

All the best and thanks again.

Engine Used: Unity
